Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship of mastoparan analogs: Effects of the number and positioning of Lys residues on secondary structure, interaction with membrane-mimetic systems and biological activity.
Literature.Author: Souza BM, Cabrera MP, Gomes PC, Dias NB, Stabeli RG, Leite NB, Neto JR, Palma MS

Literature.Title: Study of mastoparan analog peptides against Candida albicans and safety in zebrafish embryos (Danio rerio).
Literature.Author: Galeane MC, Gomes PC, Singulani JL, de Souza BM, Palma MS, Mendes-Giannini MJ, Fusco-Almeida AM

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Rat peritoneal mast cells:<10% Degranulation=160 µM,Rat peritoneal mast cells:15% Degranulation=300 µM,Rat erythrocytes:30% Hemolysis=100 µM,Rat erythrocytes:40% Hemolysis=160-300 µM,Zebrafish embryos:LC50=9.64 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CCT 1457(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15422(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 13388(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis ATCC 10708(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCT 2580(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCT 6538(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=1µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 11733(MIC=1µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans AU159(MIC=2µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus thuringiensis ATCC 10792(MIC=31µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium CCT 5079(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus hirae ATCC 10541(MIC=8µg/ml),Rhodococcus equi ATCC 25729(MIC=1µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=1µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=15.62µg/ml)
